tasks.title: Create Framer Motion Animation Components
tasks.description: Build reusable animation wrapper components following motion.instruction.md guidelines
tasks.details:
Create components in src/components/animations/:

**1. FadeUpAnimation.tsx:**
- "use client" directive
- fadeUpVariant: hidden (opacity: 0, y: 32), visible (opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.5)
- Takes children prop (ReactNode type)

**2. PageTransition.tsx:**
- "use client" directive
- Uses AnimatePresence with mode="wait"
- pageVariants: hidden, visible, exit with proper transitions
- Wraps page content for smooth transitions

Best practices from motion.instruction.md:
- Always use "use client" directive
- Define variants outside component
- Use TypeScript for props (ReactNode for children)
- Avoid useEffect for animations
- Use simple duration-based transitions (no string easing names)
- Proper AnimatePresence with unique key props
tasks.testStrategy: Test animations render smoothly, no hydration errors, no TypeScript errors, transitions work without console warnings

export async function generateMetadata({ params }: { params: { id: string } }) {

    title: `${project.title} | M. Fatihul Iqmal`,

  };
}

tasks.title: Add Page Transitions and Polish Animations
tasks.description: Implement smooth page transitions using PageTransition component and polish all animations
tasks.details:
**1. Update app/layout.tsx:**
- Wrap {children} with PageTransition component
- Ensure proper AnimatePresence setup
- Pass pathname as key for transitions

**2. Polish existing animations:**
- Review all FadeUpAnimation usages
- Add stagger delays where appropriate (especially for lists/grids)
- Ensure consistent transition durations (0.3s-0.5s)

**3. Add micro-interactions:**
- Button hover states (scale-105 or opacity changes)
- Card hover lift animations
- Icon hover rotations (Github, ExternalLink icons)
- Smooth color transitions on all interactive elements

**4. Optimize animation performance:**
- Use transform and opacity for animations (GPU accelerated)
- Avoid animating width/height directly
- Add will-change: transform on animated elements if needed

**5. Mobile-specific animations:**
- Reduce motion on mobile (prefers-reduced-motion media query)
- Simplify or disable complex animations on small screens
- Test touch interactions

**6. Scroll animations (optional bonus):**
- Use Intersection Observer or Framer Motion's useInView
- Fade in sections as they enter viewport
- Parallax effect on hero photo (subtle)
tasks.testStrategy: Page transitions smooth between all routes, no layout shifts, animations don't impact performance (60fps), mobile animations work well, no animation flicker

tasks.title: Test Responsiveness and Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing across devices and performance optimization
tasks.details:
**1. Responsive Testing:**
Test breakpoints:
- Mobile: 375px, 414px (iPhone sizes)
- Tablet: 768px, 1024px (iPad sizes)
- Desktop: 1280px, 1920px

Check:
- All pages render correctly on all sizes
- Navigation menu works on mobile
- Images scale properly
- Text remains readable
- No horizontal scroll
- Touch targets adequate (min 44x44px)

**2. Performance Optimization:**

Images:
- Verify Next.js Image optimization working
- Add width/height or fill prop to all Images
- Use priority on above-the-fold images
- Lazy load below-the-fold content

Fonts:
- Verify font-display: swap
- Check font loading doesn't cause layout shift

Code splitting:
- Verify dynamic imports where beneficial
- Check bundle size (npm run build)
- Analyze with Next.js bundle analyzer if needed

**3. Accessibility:**
- Add proper alt text to all images
- Ensure semantic HTML (h1, h2, nav, main, footer)
- Check keyboard navigation works
- Test with screen reader (basic check)
- Color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA

**4. SEO:**
- Verify all pages have metadata
- Check Open Graph tags
- Add sitemap.xml (Next.js can generate)
- Add robots.txt

**5. Performance Metrics:**
- Run Lighthouse audit (target 90+ on all)
- Check Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
- Test on slow 3G connection
- Optimize if needed

**6. Cross-browser Testing:**
- Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
- Mobile Safari, Chrome Mobile
- Check for any browser-specific issues
tasks.testStrategy: All breakpoints tested and work, Lighthouse scores 90+, no accessibility errors, SEO metadata complete, fonts load without FOUT, images optimized, no console errors
